channel.title: Loging out with dds and dscim
channel.description: on a deltascape source when i log out..with a dds or d scim...it gets deleted how can i fix this?

item.title: Loging out with dds and dscim
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“moody757, post:4, topic:236668”]Yeh i deleted this code because i wanted to remove the quest requirement for the d scim and dds…

if(wearID == 4587){ sM("You must complete Monkey Madness to equip this."); return false; } if(wearID == 1305 && q1 != 15 || wearID == 5698 && q1 != 15){ sM("You must complete Lost City to equip this."); return false; }

even when i delete && q1 != 15 it doesnt let me wield…but when i delete the whole code it wields but deletes as i logout[/quote]

Just change the item ID’s to a random number.

Read full topic
item.source: Loging out with dds and dscim

item.title: Loging out with dds and dscim
item.dc:creator: @moody757 moody757
item.description:
@moody757 wrote:

Yeh i deleted this code because i wanted to remove the quest requirement for the d scim and dds…

if(wearID == 4587){ sM("You must complete Monkey Madness to equip this."); return false; } if(wearID == 1305 && q1 != 15 || wearID == 5698 && q1 != 15){ sM("You must complete Lost City to equip this."); return false; }

even when i delete && q1 != 15 it doesnt let me wield…but when i delete the whole code it wields but deletes as i logout
